en.title: KOMINFO
description: Redesigned, performed technical maintenance and content management for the organization's website.
Built a custom WordPress theme to create a modern and unique visual identity for the organization.
Developed a mobile application for organizational purposes.

en.title: Publisher
description: Responsible for the organization's content publication process.
Uploaded and managed content across various Jurnalis Nuansa social media platforms.
Maintained and improved the organization's website appearance using WordPress.

en.title: IT Team
description: Built the official MABIM 2025 website as the main information hub containing schedules, announcements, and event documentation.
Managed content updates and ensured the website was stably accessible to all participants and committee members.
Served as a live operator, ensuring smooth live broadcasting and technical coordination during the streaming process.

en.title: Research and Development
description: Served as the documentation manager for KKN activities, ensuring every activity was well-recorded in photo and video format.
Managed KKN social media content, including caption creation, feed arrangement, and uploading all activity documentation.
Built the village website as an official information platform.

id.title: KOMINFO
description: Merancang ulang, melakukan pemeliharaan teknis dan manajemen konten website organisasi.
Membangun tema WordPress custom untuk menciptakan identitas visual yang modern dan unik bagi organisasi.
Membangun aplikasi mobile untuk keperluan organisasi.

id.title: Publisher
description: Bertanggung jawab atas proses publikasi konten organisasi.
Mengupload dan mengatur konten di berbagai platform media sosial Jurnalis Nuansa.
Memelihara dan memperbaiki tampilan website organisasi menggunakan WordPress.

id.title: Tim IT
description: Membangun website resmi MABIM 2025 sebagai pusat informasi utama yang memuat jadwal, pengumuman, dan dokumentasi kegiatan.
Mengelola pembaruan konten dan memastikan website dapat diakses dengan stabil oleh seluruh peserta dan panitia.
Bertugas sebagai operator live, memastikan kelancaran siaran langsung dan koordinasi teknis selama proses live streaming.

id.title: Penelitian dan Pengembangan
description: Bertugas sebagai pengelola dokumentasi kegiatan KKN, memastikan setiap aktivitas terekam dengan baik dalam bentuk foto maupun video.
Mengelola konten media sosial KKN, termasuk pembuatan caption, penyusunan feed, serta pengunggahan seluruh dokumentasi kegiatan.
Membangun website desa sebagai platform informasi resmi.
